issue.title: www.pornhub.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.pornhub.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pornhub.com%2F) ### Comment > На главной стало мелькать это промо. Заблокировать вроде можно, но если перейти на любое видео, там в том же примерно месте снова всплывает этот gif/frame или хз что это. Генерируется эта шняга каким-то генератором псевдослучайных символов, поэтому заблокировать вручную на главной и страницах с видео не получается. Стоит браузерное расширение + расширение AdGuard Extra. ### Screenshots

issue.title: YouTube doesn't work properly with AdGuard enabled
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.56

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

youtube.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment> YouTube doesn't load properly with AdGuard on, turning it off solves the problem. Main page gets completely blank, nothing is loading.
Sometimes when I refresh the page it starts working but eg. the comments are not loading or the video is on but the rest of the page is blank, just the player with a blank background.

3. Screenshots

comment.body:
Site does not show cookie message to me.
Please disable Safari content blockers, wait 30-60 seconds and reenable them again.

Please note you do not need the following filters:
```
EasyList
Fanboy's Social Blocking List
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets,
```

Сайт не показывает мне сообщение о файлах cookie.
Пожалуйста, отключите блокировщики контента Safari, подождите 30-60 секунд и снова включите их.

Обратите внимание, что вам не нужны следующие фильтры:
```
EasyList
Fanboy's Social Blocking List
AdGuard Cookie Notices,
AdGuard Popups,
AdGuard Mobile App Banners,
AdGuard Other Annoyances,
AdGuard Widgets,
```

issue.title: Facebook (Onion site) login / create account banner annoyance
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin 1.49.2

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.facebookwkhpilnemxj7asaniu7vnjjbiltxjqhye3mhbshg7kx5tfyd.onion/kadokawataiwan/photos/a.120278361071648/122858280813656/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Chinese filter, AdGuard Japanese filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter, EasyList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Browser: Tor Browser (since it is about the Onion site, so Tor Browser or Brave's Tor window is needed)
2. When I click into Facebook posts, there is a banner urging the user to log in or to create an account. It is an annoyance since:
  * There is no way to close the banner
  * Comments and image are obscured by the banner, and there is no way to see the obscured part

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![screenshot-1](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/103918092/5413892f-bca1-4f30-a211-b41fc0a23855)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![screenshot-2](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/103918092/c8c0d5a6-b3a5-4e28-9b1f-2f018148cba4)

</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.49.3rc15

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.reddit.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
When ads appear, the bottom widget often disappears. Caused by `reddit.com##div[style="margin-left:24px;margin-top:0"][class] > div[class] > div[class^="_"]:not([data-redditstyle]):has(div[data-before-content="advertisement"])`
2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![Screenshot from 2023-06-01 16-15-31](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/89158249/396501bb-4c74-462e-b2f2-3a46e1b9cdf2)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot 2:</summary>

![Screenshot from 2023-06-01 16-15-36](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/89158249/02553d77-c6c8-491d-89cf-9002a55dcd82)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Not reproduced.
Please try these two rules:
```
reddit.com#@#div[style="margin-left:24px;margin-top:0"][class] > div[class] > div[class^="_"]:not([data-redditstyle]):has(div[data-before-content="advertisement"]
reddit.com##div[style="margin-left:24px;margin-top:0"][class] > div[class] > div[class^="_"]:not([data-redditstyle]) > div:has(div[data-before-content="advertisement"]
```

Яндекс браузер известен тем, что ограничивает доступ к своим сайтам, сервисам расширениям, поэтому реклама отображается.
Есть несколько вариантов:
- установить другой браузер (Chrome, Firefox);
- вместо расширения использовать программу. AdGuard for Windows / AdGuard for Mac в зависимости от платформы.

comment.body:
List-KR 필터가 이미 차단하고 있는 광고이므로 재구현이 되지 않습니다.
List-KR 필터를 포함한 설치된 필터들을 최신 버전으로 업데이트해주세요.
그래도 해결되지 않으시면, Google Chrome 브라우저의 쿠키, 사이트 데이터와 캐시를 삭제해주세요.

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

7.12

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Opera

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://pikabu.ru/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

В фильтре виджетов социальных сетей, есть правило `/images/share_` оно мешает коду:
`<meta property="og:image" content="https://cs.pikabu.ru/images/share_preview/main.png">`
из-за этого невозможно использовать эту картинку как эскиз сайта экспресс-панели

![Снимок](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/93826441/c3aeff47-608a-41b9-9b08-e573ebf745e0)

Добавьте правило-исключение, наподобие:
`@@||pikabu.ru/images/share_`


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

I deleted the AdGuard extension from Chrome, reinstalled it and it helped, so far it works.

comment.body:
Resolved by List-KR filter.
The patch will be available in up to 4 hours.
After that time, you can download it by clicking `Check for filter updates...` via AdGuard menu in your browser toolbar.

<details>
<summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

List-KR 필터에 의해 해결되었습니다.
패치는 최대 4시간안에 사용하실 수 있습니다.
최대 4시간이 지난 후에 브라우저 툴바에 있는 AdGuard 아이콘을 통해 `필터 업데이트 확인...`을 클릭하여 다운로드하실 수 있습니다.

</details>

issue.title: mapcrunch.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.49.3rc15

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.mapcrunch.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment>
There's an ad placeholder at the bottom of the screen.
Can be fixed with these filters:
`mapcrunch.com###bottom-box`
`mapcrunch.com###container:style(height: 100% !important;)`

Already reported/fixed by uBlock filters: https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/issues/18277
2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>
![241575760-ffeab031-5ef4-4124-a05b-06f9aedbee3c](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/89158249/051b33a8-9a27-4eb8-8912-dde89236d9ac)


</details>

issue.title: YouTube doesn't work properly with AdGuard enabled

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.56

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

youtube.com

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. <comment> YouTube doesn't load properly with AdGuard on, turning it off solves the problem. Main page gets completely blank, nothing is loading.
Sometimes when I refresh the page it starts working but eg. the comments are not loading or the video is on but the rest of the page is blank, just the player with a blank background.

3. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1: what the player looks like with AdGuard on</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/135314713/417b537d-e72e-4716-8c84-db0ebfe6feb9)

</details>

<details><summary>Screenshot N: what the YouTube main page looks like with AdGuard on</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->
![image](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/135314713/72be8d6f-5ffc-48ac-9b7e-513968a4a593)


</details>


### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
Hello @shape55
This is the expected behavior of this filter. To make the "share" button appear, please add this rule to the custom filter:
`substack.com#@?#div > a[role="button"]:has(> div.label:contains(Share))`

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.pornhub.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pornhub.com%2F) ### Comment > На главной стало мелькать это промо. Заблокировать вроде можно, но если перейти на любое видео, там в том же примерно месте снова всплывает этот gif/frame или хз что это. Генерируется эта шняга каким-то генератором псевдослучайных символов, поэтому заблокировать вручную на главной и страницах с видео не получается. Стоит браузерное расширение + расширение AdGuard Extra. ### Screenshots

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [x] This is not an ad/bug report;
